long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clariyo simplifies any text to a level of your choice. It is a tool to personalize learning and improve comprehension of any topic, no matter how challenging. 

We built Clariyo to improve how everyone learns on the internet. Whether you're reading a complex article you don't understand or you come across a word you've heard before but don't quite know what it means, we believe Clariyo helps everyone in a personalized way. 

Simply highlight any text, right click, and select "Explain" to have any word, sentence, or paragraph explained at a level that makes sense to you. Level 1 is as simple as possible and Level 5 is explained with full complexity. 

If you have any questions, suggestions, or need help in any way, please feel free to reach out to me directly via email at dan@clariyo.com.
